original: @363a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @363a dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Three Jewels.

original: bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can //
analyzed: bcom ldan rnam par gzigs ni rgyal rigs gzi brjid can //
translated: The Blessed One Vipaśyin was of royal caste and majestic,

original: tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo brgyad khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
translated: at a time when the human lifespan was eighty thousand years, in the city of Bandhumatī,

original: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: he attained perfect buddhahood at the foot of a śirīṣa tree.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect here today.

original: bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can //
analyzed: bde gshegs gtsug tor mnga' ba rgyal rigs rdzu 'phrul can //
translated: The Sugata Śikhī graced with a crown protrusion was of royal caste and had miraculous powers,

original: tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: tshe lo bdun khri'i dus na su ka'i grong khyer du //
translated: at a time when the human lifespan was seventy thousand years, in the city of Sukhā,

original: shing mchog pun dha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shing mchog pun dha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: he attained perfect buddhahood at the foot of an excellent puṇḍarīka tree.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect here today.

original: rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can //
analyzed: rgyal ba thams cad skyob pa rgyal rigs blo gros can //
translated: The Victor Sarvābhibhū was of royal caste and wise,

original: tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du //
analyzed: tshe lo drug khri'i dus na grong khyer mnyam med du //
translated: at a time when the human lifespan was sixty thousand years, in the city of Anupamā,

original: shing mchog s'a la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shing mchog s'a la'i drung du mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: he attained perfect buddhahood at the foot of an excellent sāla tree.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis @363b phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis @363b phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata’s auspiciousness be perfect and complete here today.

original: thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs //
analyzed: thub pa 'khor ba 'jig ni bcom ldan bram ze'i rigs //
translated: The Muni Krakucchanda, the Bhagavān of the brahmin caste,

original: tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo bzhi khri'i dus na grong khyer mdzes ldan du //
translated: At the time of the forty-thousand-year lifespan, in the city of Bhadrāvatī,

original: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: shi ri sha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: Awakened at the foot of a śirīṣa tree,

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata’s auspiciousness be perfect and complete here today.

original: 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs //
analyzed: 'dren pa gser thub bslab pa mchog ldan bram ze'i rigs //
translated: The guide Kanakamuni, of the supreme training, of the brahmin caste,

original: tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du //
analyzed: tshe lo sum khri'i dus na grong khyer bde ldan du //
translated: At the time of the thirty-thousand-year lifespan, in the city of Kṣemāvatī,

original: au dum b'a ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: au dum b'a ra'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: Awakened at the foot of an udumbara tree,

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata’s auspiciousness be perfect and complete here today.

original: skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can //
analyzed: skyob pa 'od srung rgyal rigs bla med yon tan can //
translated: The protector Kāśyapa, of the royal caste, endowed with the highest qualities,

original: tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na b'a r'a na s'i ru //
analyzed: tshe lo nyi khri'i dus na b'a r'a na s'i ru //
translated: At the time of the twenty-thousand-year lifespan, in Vārāṇasī,

original: n+ya gro dha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: n+ya gro dha'i shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: Awakened at the foot of an nyagrodha tree,

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect and complete right now!

original: 'gro mgon sh'akya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can //
analyzed: 'gro mgon sh'akya thub pa rgyal rigs brtson 'grus can //
translated: The protector of beings, Shakyamuni, a member of the warrior caste, persevering,

original: tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du //
analyzed: tshe lo brgya ba'i dus na ser skya'i grong khyer du //
translated: In the time when the human lifespan was one hundred years, in the city of Kapila,

original: aa shvattha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: aa shvattha yi shing drung mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: At the foot of an ashvattha tree, he attained full enlightenment.

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect and complete right now!

original: sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rabs bdun bkra shis phun sum tshogs pa gang //
translated: The perfect auspiciousness of the seven generations of Buddhas,

original: phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba //
analyzed: phyogs dus kun gyi bde gshegs byin brlabs rmad byung ba //
translated: The wondrous blessings of the Sugatas of all directions and times,

original: chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba //
analyzed: chos dbyings rnam dag rten 'brel stobs ldan mi 'gyur ba //
translated: The unchanging power of the pure dharmadhatu's interdependence,

original: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
analyzed: deng 'dir bde gshegs bkra shis phun sum tshogs gyur cig /
translated: May the Sugata's auspiciousness be perfect and complete right now!

original: sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
analyzed: sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa rdzogs so ////
translated: The verses of auspiciousness of the seven generations of Buddhas are complete.
